info.name: Memrise_CHINESE-Study (嵐 - 隼体)
info.description:
Font family has been changed for all study windows.
Font sizes were increased where it was needed from 1.2~2 times
Beautiful Calligraphic hanwriting font  "嵐 - 隼体" is used, downloadable on link below
URL: https://yadi.sk/d/QSVDq-ye3Trewu
